summary: This is a brief email forwarding an attached document regarding Jeffrey Epstein, sent to the Captain of the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 11, 2019. The email itself contains minimal content, serving primarily as a transmittal with an attachment.

locations.address: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
locations.context: The email is addressed to the Captain of this facility.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 11, 2019, concerning Jeffrey Epstein.
The email is addressed to the Captain of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where Epstein was being held.
The email's primary purpose is to forward an attached document, the content of which is not described in the provided text.
The date of the email (August 11, 2019) is shortly after Epstein's arrest in July 2019 and just days before his death on August 10, 2019, suggesting it relates to his incarceration.
